commit message:
Issue #10: added a setting for the background color.

Made the robot theme have a transparent background.
Issue #10: The color picker works on 1.5!
Issue #10: Use the background setting for the animated gif
Issue #10: Fix NPE when getting the background color
Issue #10: Make theme 5001 transparent.  Removed 'background.color' theme property.

Issue #10: Compress transparent pngs with pngquant

pngquant --speed 1  --posterize=3

Compressed themes 5004 and 5001 with pngquant

pngquant --speed 1  --posterize=3 *.png
Add color picker preference to the credits
Include the version name in the apk file name
